00013 /*
00014  * Iterated Covariance Filter Scheme.
00015  *  A non-linear Covariance (Kalman) filter with relinearisation and iteration
00016  *
00017  * The observe algorithm uses the iterated non-linear formulation 
00018  * from Bar-Shalom and Fortmann p.119 (full scheme)
00019  * Discontinous observe models require that state is normailised with
00020  * respect to the observation.
00021  *
00022  * The filter is operated by performing a
00023  *  predict, observe
00024  * cycle defined by the base class
00025  */
00026 #include "bayesFlt.hpp"
00027 
00028 /* Filter namespace */
00029 namespace Bayesian_filter
00030 {
00031 
00032 class Iterated_covariance_scheme;
00033 
00034 class Iterated_observe_model : virtual public Observe_model_base
00035 /* Linrz observation model which can be iterated
00036     Hx can be relinearised
00037  */
00038 {
00039 protected: // model is not sufficient, it is used to build observe model's
00040     Iterated_observe_model ()
00041     {}
00042 public:
00043     virtual void relinearise (const FM::Vec& x) =0;
00044     // Relinearised about state x
00045 };
00046 
00047 
00048 class Iterated_terminator : public Bayes_base
00049 /*
00050  * Termination condition for filter Iteration
00051  *  Used by iterated observe to parameterise termination condition
00052  *  If iteration continues, the terminator must also relinearise the model about the filters new state
00053  *
00054  * Defaults to immediately terminating the iteration
00055  *
00056  * A more useful terminator can built by derivation.
00057  * For example terminator constructed with a reference to the filter and model can
00058  * detect convergence of x and/or X
00059  */
00060 {
00061 public:
00062     virtual bool term_or_relinearize (const Iterated_covariance_scheme& f)
00063     {
00064         return true;
00065     }
00066 };
00067 
00068 class Counted_iterated_terminator : public Iterated_terminator
00069 /*
00070  * Termination condition with a simple fixed number of iterations 
00071  */
00072 {
00073 public:
00074     Counted_iterated_terminator (Iterated_observe_model& model, unsigned iterations) :
00075         m(model), i(iterations)
00076     {}
00077     bool term_or_relinearize (const Iterated_covariance_scheme& f);
00078     Iterated_observe_model& m;
00079     unsigned i;
00080 };
00081 
00082 
00083 
00084 class Iterated_covariance_scheme : public Linrz_kalman_filter
00085 {
00086 public:
00087     Iterated_covariance_scheme (std::size_t x_size, std::size_t z_initialsize = 0);
00088     /* Initialised filter requries an addition iteration limit for the
00089        observe algorithm */
00090     Iterated_covariance_scheme& operator= (const Iterated_covariance_scheme&);
00091     // Optimise copy assignment to only copy filter state
00092 
00093     void init ();
00094     void update ();
00095     Float predict (Linrz_predict_model& f);
00096 
00097     Float observe (Linrz_uncorrelated_observe_model& h, Iterated_terminator& term, const FM::Vec& z);
00098     Float observe (Linrz_correlated_observe_model& h, Iterated_terminator& term, const FM::Vec& z);
00099     // Observe with iteration
00100     Float observe (Linrz_uncorrelated_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& z)
00101     {   // Observe with default termination
00102         Iterated_terminator term;
00103         return observe (h, term, z);
00104     }
00105     Float observe (Linrz_correlated_observe_model& h, const FM::Vec& z)
00106     {   // Observe with default termination
00107         Iterated_terminator term;
00108         return observe (h, term, z);
00109     }
00110 
00111 public:                     // Exposed Numerical Results
00112     FM::SymMatrix S, SI;        // Innovation Covariance and Inverse
00113 
00114 protected:                  // Permenantly allocated temps
00115     FM::RowMatrix tempX;
00116 
00117 protected:                  // allow fast operation if z_size remains constant
00118     std::size_t last_z_size;
00119     void observe_size (std::size_t z_size);
00120                             // Permenantly allocated temps
00121     FM::Vec s;
00122     FM::Matrix HxT;
00123 };

00126 }//namespace
